title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4002.16 - Emergency permit
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4002.16 - Emergency permit

State Regulations

In an emergency, the steward of the commission may
permit owners, trainers, assistant trainers and jockeys to start, train or ride
pending action on their applications. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4002.16

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
